column5: Hey all Got my daily Bass Pro cyber Monday week email this morning and they have the regular Buddy heaters (9000 BTU) on sale today only. Price including duty, taxes and delivery to Canada is $87.65!!!!  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/CFPageC?storeId=10151&catalogId=10051&langId=-1&appID=87193&APPsection=web-busters-12-3-heater&cm_sp=WBstrDec2014_EMAIL&om_rid=NtBxr7&om_mid=_BUfxrpB89wHIya  Great deal, so I picked one up.
